name: Just drive (d1373rgamedev)
description:
Just drive around and have fun!

This pack is a mesh-up of some free assets.
a little bit adjusted so they can be played together.
resized, arranged added some rigidbodies, and so on.

Keyboard Controls

  • Brake - Arrow Key Down
  • Steering Left Right - Arrow Keys Left/Right
  • Throttle - Arrow Key Up
  • Drift - Y
  • Jump - Space
  • Boost - left ctrl

Game Controller Controls

  • Brake - Left Stick Down or Joypad Down
  • Steering Left Right - Left Stick or Joypad or L1/R1
  • Throttle - A
  • Drift - B
  • Jump - Y
  • Boost - X

tested with XboxOne Controller

Credits:

This software is based on the "Arcade car physics" Asset mashed up with some others.
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/arcade-car-physics-119484

furthermore thanks to

  • Free Cartoon World, by Richard Lester
  • Toon Gas Station, by SICS Games
  • Kajaman's Roads - Free, by Kajaman
  • Low Poly Road Pack, by Broken Vector
  • City Package, by 255 Pixel Studios
